locations.name: Main Pool
locations.fullDescription: Immerse yourself in our stunning infinity pool that seamlessly blends with the lush jungle landscape. Perfect for relaxation and enjoying breathtaking sunset views.

locations.name: Restaurant
locations.fullDescription: Savor exquisite farm-to-table cuisine crafted from organic ingredients sourced from our own gardens and local farmers. A culinary journey celebrating Balinese flavors.

locations.name: Spa
locations.fullDescription: Rejuvenate your body and mind with our holistic spa treatments. Experience traditional Balinese healing therapies in a serene jungle setting.

locations.name: Yoga Pavilion
locations.fullDescription: Start your day with sunrise yoga in our open-air pavilion surrounded by nature. Daily sessions guided by experienced instructors for all levels.

locations.name: Floating Lake Villa
locations.fullDescription: A luxurious floating villa on Ulaman's bio-filtered lake. Experience unparalleled privacy and connection with nature.

locations.name: Cocoon Jungle Villa
locations.fullDescription: Indulge in an unparalleled blend of exotic elegance and coziness. Nestled in the jungle canopy for ultimate privacy.

locations.name: Avatar Tree House
locations.fullDescription: Experience luxury in an avant-garde design with breathtaking 180¬∞ views of the jungle and valley.

locations.name: River Stone Villa
locations.fullDescription: Unique villa featuring natural stone elements and riverside location. Perfect blend of nature and luxury.

locations.name: Reception
locations.fullDescription: Our welcoming reception area where your journey begins. Our dedicated team is available 24/7 to assist with all your needs.

locations.name: Tropical Garden
locations.fullDescription: Wander through our meticulously maintained tropical gardens featuring exotic flora and peaceful meditation spots.

locations.name: Jungle Cafe
locations.fullDescription: Enjoy artisan coffee and healthy snacks in our cozy cafe surrounded by jungle greenery. Perfect spot for morning breaks.

locations.name: Library Lounge
locations.fullDescription: A quiet sanctuary for book lovers. Browse our collection of wellness, travel, and fiction books in a peaceful setting.

locations.name: Gym
locations.fullDescription: Stay active amidst natural beauty in our Gym, featuring panoramic views through clear glass panels. With state-of-the-art fitness equipment, enjoy limitless workout options that seamlessly blend exercise and nature, ensuring an invigorating and rejuvenating stay.

locations.name: Garden Villa
locations.fullDescription: Spacious villa surrounded by lush tropical gardens. Perfect for families or groups seeking privacy and comfort.

locations.name: Valley View Villa
locations.fullDescription: Perched on the hillside with stunning valley views. Wake up to the sounds of nature and panoramic vistas.

locations.name: Cliffside Villa
locations.fullDescription: Dramatic cliffside location offering unparalleled views. The ultimate retreat for those seeking extraordinary experiences.

locations.name: Main Entrance
locations.fullDescription: Your gateway to paradise. Our impressive entrance sets the tone for your transformative journey at Ulaman.

locations.name: Tennis Court
locations.fullDescription: Professional tennis court surrounded by tropical beauty. Equipment and coaching available upon request.
